DataElement.preferredName: Person Transplantation Intervention or Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation as outlined in the study protocol for questions related to procedures involving the transference of tissue or organ.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Transplantation Intervention or Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Transplantation Intervention or Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient had prior allogen
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogeneic bone marrow transplantation or prior solid organ transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogenic bone marrow transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogeneic bone marrow transplant or double umbilical cord blood transplantation (dUCBT)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex -  5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has an interval of greater than 4 weeks elapsed since allogeneic blood or marrow transplantation (BMT) if performed and absence of active GVHD?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogenic bone marrow transplantation, double umbilical cord blood transplantation (dUCBT) or prior solid organ transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogeneic bone marrow or prior organ transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had or is planned for solid organ transplant or allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has been assigned to receive Veliparib, does patient have treatment-related AML (t-AML)/MDS, or with features suggestive of AML/MDS, or who have had prior allogeneic bone marrow transplant or double umbilical cord blood transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of allogeneic organ transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a prior history of allogeneic stem cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior double umbilical cord blood transplantation (dUCBT)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had a prior solid organ or bone marrow transplant with the exception of prior renal transplant for whom dialysis may be employed in event of good rehabilitation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had previous allogenic bone marrow transplant or double umbilical cord blood transplantation (dUCBT)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of prior allogeneic transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of bone marrow transplant and organ transplant, including allogenic stem cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received an allogenic stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have history of allogeneic solid organ transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient previously received a solid organ transplant or allogenic stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior allogeneic stem cell or organ transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a previous allogeneic bone marrow transplant or double umbilical cord blood transplantation (dUBCT)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of solid organ or allogeneic stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior allogeneic stem cell or solid organ transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient undergone prior allogenic transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of bone marrow or solid organ transplantation (regardless of current immunosuppressive therapy needs)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of solid organ or hematopoietic bone marrow transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received any allogeneic (non-autologous) bone marrow or stem cell transplant (with or without TBI) or boost infusion (excluding DLI) within the last 84 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of solid organ or bone marrow transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of prior allogeneic stem cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient previously received allogeneic stem cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have prior allogeneic stem cell transplantation?
